question: A sea plane from which country has arrived in Ahmedabad recently, which would be operated by Spice Jet?
explanation:
A sea plane from Maldives arrived in Ahmedabad, which would be used to connect the Sabarmati riverfront in Ahmedabad to the Statue of Unity in Kevadia, Narmada district.
Prime Minister Narendra Modi will take the official inaugural flight on October 31 2020. The sea plane would be operated by Spice Jet.
